title: Chicken Caesar salad with tofu dressing
ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts, cubed', '2 tablespoons oil', '300g package silken tofu', '6 to 8 cloves of garlic', '2 tablespoons capers', '120ml lemon juice', '120ml olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 boneless anchovies, chopped (optional)', '1 head Romaine lettuce, torn into pieces', 'croutons, for garnish', 'grated parmesan cheese']
